top_level.desc: Loose particles, ice flakes, insulation, paint chips near camera; often slow, drifting, tumbling
Gas venting or attitude control firings; sudden snow-like bursts
Specular reflections from satellites/space junk; brief flares
Starlink or other satellite trains; steady linear motions
Fast streaks/arcs; sudden brightening and fragmentation
Lens flare, sensor bloom, compression ghosts, hot pixels
Discrete luminous spheroid with non-ballistic motion
Elongated object without obvious aerodynamic surfaces
Triangular or wedge geometry with stable vertices/lights

hynek_mapping.CE-1: Within ~500ft visual (space-cam proxy: near-field within a few meters of lens)
hynek_mapping.CE-2: Physical effects (N/A for remote cams unless platform telemetry anomalies)
hynek_mapping.CE-3+: Entity/interaction (out of scope for this pipeline)

near_field_flags: sharp focus vs star field blurred
artifact_flags: appears only on high gain frames
